display_long_description:
Vendetta Forever fuses rapid-fire tactical gunplay with effortless style across more than 60 levels of cinema-inspired action.

**Powered by Lo-Kill-Motion**
[media]

Shoot to kill. Kill to move. Dispatch enemies and seize their weapon in mid-air to propel yourself forward, chaining takedowns together in a frantic fight to the bitter end.

**Live a power fantasy**
[media]

Rampage through over 60 levels, spanning saloon shoot-outs to high-tech hijackings at 30,000 feet. Blast, zip and slice through enemies to a pounding synthetic soundtrack.

**A million ways to die**
[media]

At your disposal is an outrageous arsenal, from iconic silenced pistols to a high-powered sniper rifle and even a humble pencil.

**Rinse, Reload, Repeat**
[media]

The action never ends with copious collectibles and game-changing modifiers that enrich every run for leaderboard glory.
